data.title: Private schools are businesses, students are customers. Am I right?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 11): Nope.

It is true that private schools are businesses. But JUST LIKE the ”customer” of a public school is NOT the parent or student but the taxpaying culture, which benefits from having an educated voting public and jury pool, the customers of private schools are colleges and cu...
